item.description:
Cardio Dance with Amy!

 

Wesley Hall at First United Methodist Church

57 Peters St. North Andover, MA 01845

(across from Panera, Burger King and Burton's Grill off 114 and 125) (map)

*DECEMBER SPECIAL: ALL STUDENTS ONLY $5/CLASS!

 

HERE IT IS: MY hottest, most fun and exciting class: Cardio Dance with Amy!

It's got all the calorie-torchin​g cardio dance of our Zumba classes BUT with the addition of your favorite songs from today's top Pop charts and music videos with some old school 80's and 90's hits thrown in!

You're gonna love it as you bring out your inner Diva and we dance our cares away together! Watch out MTV...here we come!

 

***OPEN TO THE PUBLIC***

Only $10 Walk-In Rate

4 Class-Card for only $32!

Please be sure to "like" my page on Facebook for updates and my best diet and nutrition tips under "ZumbaDancewith​Amy" Thank You!!

See complete schedule and more details at: www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com

Thank You!
item.why:
If you like Zumba, you'll LOVE this! It's just like Zumba but with more fun songs from today's hottest radio hits (and some of your favorites from the past!)
Please see: www.zumbadancewithamy.com for details.

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Cardio Dance with Amy
